title: Allow to change the window size in LaunchUriForResultsAsync

comments.body: This is really needed, along with restricted capabilities.  Is it done yet?

We agree. We would like to build multiple Apps that can be started from a single Master App. Start such Apps with custom data and return result data is possible already but starting the Apps in maximized mode or custom window size is needed. Otherwise this API is not useable for us as well.
